Module com.lmax.solana4j
Package com.lmax.solana4j.programs

Class SystemProgram.SystemProgramFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lmax.solana4j.programs.SystemProgram.SystemProgramFactory
  • Enclosing class:
    SystemProgram
    public static final class SystemProgram.SystemProgramFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Inner factory class for building system program instructions using a TransactionBuilder.

    • Method Detail

      • createAccount

        public SystemProgram.SystemProgramFactory createAccount​(PublicKey payer,
                                                        PublicKey newAccount,
                                                        long lamports,
                                                        long space,
                                                        PublicKey program)
        Creates a new account.
        Parameters:
        payer - the public key of the payer
        newAccount - the public key of the new account
        lamports - the number of lamports to transfer to the new account
        space - the amount of space to allocate for the new account
        program - the public key of the program to associate with the new account
        Returns:
        this SystemProgramFactory instance

        Parameters:
        nonce - the public key of the nonce account
        authorized - the public key of the authorized account
        Returns:

      • transfer

        public SystemProgram.SystemProgramFactory transfer​(PublicKey from,
                                                   PublicKey to,
                                                   long lamports)
        Transfers funds between accounts.
        Parameters:
        from - the public key of the account to transfer funds from
        to - the public key of the account to transfer funds to
        lamports - the amount of lamports to transfer
        Returns:
        this SystemProgramFactory instance
